Probably the best counter strike that was made.

Counter Strike,

A miracle of the FPS genre.

Giving this game a score less than 10, will result in shame. Play this game, then play a modern FPS multiplayer game, and you will see that this game was the innovator. A deliverer of fine quick reflex shooting and an unlimited skill learning curve. A provider of that instant gratification kill which was solely based on skill. There are no perks, levels, experience points to give you the edge. You are either the best of the match, or you aren't. You cant become "level 100" by just playing 15 hours a day like most modern day multiplayer shooters. When you die, you have to wait. This is the punishment. You wait, and watch, and learn your enemies tactics, and choice of weapons. You learn who's the best, so that you can save that extra flash bang just for that sucker. This punishment is gives tremendous value to the kill. When the other player is dead, hes gone. He's crying, lighting up a cigarette, going to the bathroom, watching how badass you are, or all of the above. He was eliminated, gone, for 10 minutes. The team tactics are a whole other story. If a team is being plastered by another team with more skilled players, it can make a comeback with team tactics. Team tactics are essential to the success of an average team. Also the level of modifications that this game offers cannot be overlooked. Every weapon has its own characteristics, and your fighting style must adapt to the weapon you have chosen. Yes this is also true with modern shooters, but CS emphasized this more. There are no cheap weapons, no grenade launchers or rocket launchers. Every weapon is completely balanced, and even a hand gun can do the trick if you know how to use it. There is no auto-aim (hello Halo and Call of Duty?) Its you, the mouse, the gun, the target retical, and your enemies face.

This game, is a perfect score of 10, and none less.

[h1][b]Counter-Strike[/b][/h1]

[h1]O que dizer sobre um simples Mod de Half Life que tornou-se um dos jogos mais jogados do mundo todo?![/h1]

Jogo esse game desde 2004, eu e meu irmão mais velho nós jogamos muito antigamente, um contra o outro ou no mesmo time, principalmente nas Lan Houses com os nossos amigos, e sem contar os campeonatos que a gente criava entre nós, valendo lanche, refrigerante e dentre outras coisas, como foi ótimo essa época. Um orgulho tremendo de ter gasto milhões de horas jogando, marcou muito minha infância e tenho só há agradecer por ter tido uma das melhores experiências que alguém poderia em um ''simples jogo eletrônico'', claro que não poderia deixar de falar que é impressionante como o tempo passa, e ele não envelhece, sempre dá aquela vontade de voltar a joga-lo, sentir aquela vibe de antigamente, revivendo pelo menos uma boa parte daqueles [b]tempos[/b] que nunca mais voltarão.

[b]Um dos melhores FPS disparado, incomparável, único e memorável. Um jogo que é imortal só pelo fato da comunidade ser muito ativa mesmo depois de tantos anos.[/b]

Foi daí que eu comecei a jogar FPS e nunca mais parei, depois do primeiro DOOM é claro hahaha!...

Compra logo, o que você está esperando?!
 
[h1]§ Recomendadíssimo 10000/10 §[/h1]

Полное гавно, такой дресни и тира я в жизни не видела, половина пуль улетает хрен знает куда, отдача такая, будто у меня скорострельная балистическая снайпера, разброс такой, что дуло как будто резиновое. Каждый сервер напичкан бесполезным шлаком от которого загрузка невыносима долгая, музыка орёт на всю квартиру, каждый 20-30 летний мужик считает долго сделать меня випом или админом, это просто полнейший шлак, каждый сервер имеет вирус, который после не выпускает из этого самого сервера до тех пока, пока ты не выключишь кс вообще, от этого помогает только переустановка, за эти 13 часов, я переустановила её раз 20. Если вам не жалко деньги и вы конченный даун который считает себя олдфаго, покупайте и желательно никогда из неё вы ходить. У меня всё.
